rdf:Description.dc:title: A guide for midlife career moves 2003
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Human Resources and Employment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Topics covered include knowledge and attitudes best suited to adopt to changing work; skills that can be transferred from one work to another; financial and lifestyle needs, non-traditional work, lifelong learning strategies.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Occupational mobility.
Job enrichment.
Career development.
